2.title: Portobello
2.plot: Dylan Bell has been telling white lies to his wife Catherine about the move to their new house. He's in cahoots with the Secret Removers so he can surprise her by doing the move without her knowing. He'll take the family away for a short break while Alison Cork and George Johnson makeover key areas of the new house in Portobello, near Edinburgh, and move the family in. What will be Catherine's reaction when she realises what has been going on behind her back? Will she like what the Secret Removers have done?

3.title: Harrogate
3.plot: Church pastor John Payne arranges for the Secret Removers to move his family into their new house, without wife Kate knowing anything about it. While the family is away Ben Huckerby and Judith Hopkins inject some much needed colour, redecorating three rooms to what they hope will be Kate's liking. But will she approve of the way her new home looks and of being kept in the dark?

4.title: Sleaford
4.plot: After years of life in the RAF James and Leah Kirkman have bought their first house together. But he's organising for the Secret Removers to move them in whilst they go away for the night. When Leah returns her new house will be ready for her, complete with freshly decorated rooms and most, but not all, of their furniture. Will she approve of the Secret Removers hard work, and of being kept in the dark by her husband?

5.title: Blackpool
5.plot: Experts Claire Smith and Judith Hopkins move the Ed and Jennifer Impett into their new house without her knowing what's going on. The garden seems to have been the main reason for buying the house, so will Jennifer welcome having the decor being decided for her, or will she be getting Ed to repaint as soon as the Secret Removers have left?

8.title: Galashields
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Middlesbrough
9.plot: Ben Huckerby and Judith Hopkins move a young couple in Middlesbrough into their brand new house - without one of them knowing anything about it. Sandra Cardona wants to surprise partner Michael Peace by getting the Secret Removers to do the move and decorate their home while she takes him away for the night. In just 48 hours can Ben and Judith find harmony between Michael's love of computer gaming and Sandra's desire for a more homely style. And will her Cuban roots inspire Ben to really push his designs to the limit?

13.title: Ashford
13.plot: In Ashford, Kent, Daniel Dryden doesn't realize that his wife, Susie, has enlisted Secret Removers Ben Huckerby and Judith Hopkins to makeover their new house and move them in. And boy, does the house need their help! The team take sledge hammers to the 1970s features before they even think of paint colours and wallpaper patterns. It's a huge task to get this young couple and their young son the contemporary home they want...and they'll only know if they have succeeded when Daniel turns up on the doorstep for his big surprise.

imdb.title: The Secret Removers
plot: A team of designers and property experts secretly move families to their new home and give the new pad a makeover in the process.::Max Barber
